title: Recruiting for D5+ and S5+ team.

embed.description: Apply here to have the possibility to join Apples Are Sour (Diamond 5+) and Lemons Are Sour(Silver 5+). We are going to have 2 teams, the first team with Diamond 5+ and the 2nd team will be Silver 5+

body:
Hey guys, 

If you're wanting to join a team, consider filling out the information required in the document and we'll get back to you in game.

All the prerequisites are within the document and if you have any questions feel free to add me in game and we can talk. :)

Thanks, 
Josh.

replies.body:
Diamond 4 ADC just applied if you guys are interested,
Wyndhem is my ingame now!
If a person were to qualify for the Diamond Team but wishes to play on the Silver Team can he/she apply for the Silver Team instead?
